name: Molière
storyline: In 1645, Molière is in jail and Mr Jourdain paid to make him free with condition to help Mr Jourdain to woo Célimène. Mr Jourdain thinks that Dorante, a friend, can help him too but he's here to make fun of him. Molière will help Mr Jourdain to opens his eyes on Dorante and Célimène. Mr Jourdain frees Molière after, whose writes plays about that story.
